House Bill/Resolution NO. HB02105
FULL TITLE : AN ACT CREATING ONE (1) ADDITIONAL BRANCH OF THE REGIONAL TRIAL COURT IN THE TWELFTH JUDICIAL REGION TO BE STATIONED AT THE MUNICIPALITY OF MLANG, PROVINCE OF COTABATO, FURTHER AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE BATAS PAMBANSA BLG. 129, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS 'THE JUDICIARY REORGANIZATION ACT OF 1980', AS AMENDED AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : TEJADA, JOSE "PING-PING" I.
DATE FILED : 2016-07-27
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2018-10-08
      2. Approved by the Committee on Appropriations on 2018-10-08
          -Unnumbered Substitute Bill was approved without amendment.
